abstract: Report by New York City Education Dept finds as many as 40 percent of students who need special education services are not getting them; severely criticizes systems used to track students who need special services.
lead_paragraph: The city’s Education Department said that its data systems were so unreliable that it was not exactly sure what percentage of students were not receiving the services.

headline.main: Thousands of New York City Students Deprived of Special-Education Services, Report Says
headline.print_headline: Thousands Deprived of Special-Education Services, Report Says

snippet: The city’s Education Department said that its data systems were so unreliable that it was not exactly sure what percentage of students were not receiving the services.
